reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute. The quality receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's good while others report low quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VOLS colors
items.body: Cute too good quality fits in for VOLS days! Read more
items.author: Warunee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, thick, good quality, color is a bit different than pictured
items.body: Love this! It’s so warm and comfy. I got what I thought was the yellow one but it’s more orange. So the colors don’t exactly match as pictured, also got a few comments thinking I had it on inside out because of the stitching of the seams on the shoulder area but really I’d buy this again in other colors. It’s super thick and warm. Good quality! Read more
items.author: Dominique

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: I bought this sweater and returned it. It’s super cute but I thought it looked weird on me. I wish I could’ve made it look cute! Read more
items.author: Cassidy Arnold

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not impressed with quality control
items.body: I ordered this and received it in a timely fashion. It was cute but the pieces of the garment were sewn so that some seams were on the outside. It was clearly a mistake not a fashion choice. I chose to return and get a replacement but the replacement was also made incorrectly. Not impressed with quality control. Read more
items.author: John

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go Vols!
items.body: Super cute and good quality. Perfect for any Tennessee fan. Read more
items.author: Casey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is so cute!
items.body: It’s very soft and it’s a perfect fit. I’m 5’7 160 lbs and I ordered a Medium. It fits great and it the perfect amount of oversized. The white squares are a little tinted from all the orange, but it’s not enough to tell or be a big deal just know they’re not pure white. I love this sweater and it’s perfect for all the UT Vols sports! Read more
items.author: Joe

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Higher expectations based on advertisement photos
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Made in China. Low quality. I normally wear a small. If wanting oversized, size up. I would find a higher quality sweater and buy that instead. Read more
items.author: Stachia Fey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dope!
items.body: I love the colours of this reminds me of Tennessee Read more
items.author: morgan

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orange Checkered. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
